basics.name: Accountant
basics.label: Accountant
basics.summary: Practical knowledge and a thorough understanding of the principles, methods and theories, laws, regulations and directives of accounting. Proven skills in providing training of generally accepted accounting principles and procedures.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Practical knowledge in accounting. Provided accounting instruction to assist application and compliance of generally accepted accounting principles and procedures relating to accounts payables, monthly reconciliation and disbursements.
highlights: Review, verify and print cost and trust checks
Prepare bank deposits for cash received
Prepare monthly reports from several cost and trust accounts

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Validated a variety of accounting data that is entered into schedules and accounts; Applied appropriate accounting techniques and standard practices when entering, tracking, analyzing, reconciling and reporting on assigned customer's accounts of responsibility.
highlights: Validated a variety of accounting data
Processed and maintain accurate accounts payable
Assisted with monthly account payable closing procedures

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Reviewed and analyzed vendor bills and employee expense reports for accuracy and entered data into Great Plains accounting system to be tracked and paid timely.
highlights: Entered data into Great Plains accounting system
